Uses of Package
org.descripter.js.api

  • Packages that use org.descripter.js.api 
    Package Description
    org.descripter
    Sample codes that the author has been using in testing this library.
    org.descripter.js
    Utilities for descripting, interpretation, compilation, memory class loading, and so on.
    org.descripter.js.api
    Emulates the key features of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.api.core
    Represents the core objects of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.api.global
    Represents the global functions for core objects of the JavaScript language.
    org.descripter.js.ss
    A simplest HTTP server for running Server-Side JavaScript scriptlets and JavaScript Server Pages.
  • Classes in org.descripter.js.api used by org.descripter 
    Class and Description
    Context
    A base class for representing various related contexts in JavaScript.
    Core
    Facilitates with the core features of a JavaScript engine.
    Global
    Emulates the global contexts of JavaScript.
    Objective
    An abstract base class to represent JavaScript objective contexts.
    Script
    Emulates script contexts of JavaScript codes.
  • Classes in org.descripter.js.api used by org.descripter.js 
    Class and Description
    Context
    A base class for representing various related contexts in JavaScript.
    Objective
    An abstract base class to represent JavaScript objective contexts.
    Script
    Emulates script contexts of JavaScript codes.
  • Classes in org.descripter.js.api used by org.descripter.js.api 
    Class and Description
    Cases
    Represents a cache of cases emulating the case clauses of JavaScript switch statements.
    Context
    A base class for representing various related contexts in JavaScript.
    Core
    Facilitates with the core features of a JavaScript engine.
    For
    An abstract class of Script Contexts to emulate the for-in statements in JavaScript.
    Function
    An abstract class of Script Contexts to emulate function declaration in JavaScript.
    Functor
    Emulates JavaScript function definitions.
    Global
    Emulates the global contexts of JavaScript.
    Key
    Emulates the object properties of JavaScript.
    Objective
    An abstract base class to represent JavaScript objective contexts.
    Script
    Emulates script contexts of JavaScript codes.
    Script.MyFunction
    An abstract base class of Function without generic types.
    Script.MyFunctor
    An abstract base class of Functor without generic types.
    Value
    Emulates late-evaluations.
    Var
    Emulates JavaScript variables.
